member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE
member.summary: The interpolation mode used to scale the image in the Bitmap source effect.If the mode disables the mipmap, then BitmapSouce will cache the image at the resolution determined by the Scale and EnableDPICorrection properties.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
member.summary: Samples the nearest single point and uses that. Doesn't generate a mipmap.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE_LINEAR
member.summary: Uses a four point sample and linear interpolation. Doesn't generate a mipmap.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE_CUBIC
member.summary: Uses a 16 sample cubic kernel for interpolation. Doesn't generate a mipmap.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE_FANT
member.summary: Uses the WIC fant interpolation, the same as the IWICBitmapScaler interface. Doesn't generate a mipmap.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAPSOURCE_INTERPOLATION_MODE_MIPMAP_LINEAR
member.summary: Generates mipmap chain in system memory using bilinear interpolation. For each mipmap the effect scales to the nearest multiple of 0.5 using bilinear interpolation and then scales the remaining amount using linear interpolation.
